title: # Agentic Trading agent
content: Use Darwin Godel machine along with Model Context Protocol to trade on Kalshi and identify arbitrage opportunities

title: Security (red team) agent
content: Based on Cisco's Hypershield architecture, building a similar tool to exploit the vulnerabilities instead of prevention, emphasis on a pipeline to get data

title: Algorithm Learning web app
content: Depending on time to solve and difficulty, recommends problems to solve, takes problems from LeetCode, Codeforces, Atcoder, and solved.ac

title: Twitter Clone
content: Focus on system architecture and low latency project

title: Gaming Engine
content: Emphasis on compiler and OS configuration
